summary:
I have a background in education, customer service and recruitment, which has enhanced my social and people skills. My last job experience as a recruiter/trainer at Picnic also helped me grow as a team leader. I was in charge of hiring new employees, as well as training them to reach the targets within the company.

I loved my job! It gave me the opportunity to interact with a lot of people from different backgrounds and nationalities. It also helped me to discover I want to develop further as an recruiter.

Please feel free to contact me. I'm looking forward for a new experience.
